change_password_error_same_password: Current password and new password are the same
change_password_text: Changing your password from time to time is a safe habit. Just complete this form to proceed.
change_password_success message: Good news! Your password has been successfully changed.
change_password_failed_message:
Sorry, your password couldn't be changed.
If you keep seeing this, feel free to contact us.
forget_password_text: Don't worry, it happens to the best of us. Just enter your email and we'll get you on your way.
forget_password_message2: You can reset your password by using this link :
forget_password_failed_message2:
We didn't find this email in our system. Please check and be sure it is correct.
If you keep seeing this, feel free to contact us.
forget_password_succes_message: We sent a reset password to your email.
login_page_text: You must log in to access the ClouDIA platform.</br>Simply fill the form below to get started.
create_account_text:
Your account is your gateway to the ClouDIA platform.
Complete this form to get started.
All fields are mendatory.
create_account_enter_captcha: Prove that you are a real person by entering the safety code present in this image.
create_account_password_tooltip:
Password must contain:
1 number
1 uppercase
1 lowercase
create_account_succes_message: You can now log in into the cloudia system.
about_header: ClouDIA is a project with enrionmental and socials concerns.
about_environment: The project's main objective is to gather data from projects all around the world in a veriety of scientific fields in order to someday maybe establish relations and improve our world !
about_cloud: By offering easy access and vizualisation of data, it is our hope that scientists all around the world will see their tasks eased and that people will notice precisely what is wrong and what is good with their environnement.
about_international: Since everyone can access data for projects close to them, we hope to see groups forming and joining forces to improve the quality of their lives as well as their communities.
about_sensors: Sensors are at the heart of Cloudia, which aims to gather data and make it socially useful.
carousel_ifrs_caption: We received a warm welcome at our arrival at the IFRS in Porto Alegre.
carousel_evandro_caption: Enjoying the brazilian food: churasco at our partner's house.
carousel_hotel_caption: Wether the institute is open or close, there's always a way to work!
carousel_stadium_caption: A walk to the stadium is the best way to get closer to Brazil's national sport.
carousel_sunset_caption: Water is natural wonder, that's why we work so hard to preserve it.
carousel_team_caption: Our team this year, ready for Brazil!
carousel_bagging_caption: Fundraising is essential for a project like us. Thanks to Super C to allow us to bag at their supermarket for the easter weekend.
carousel_spaghetti_caption: We had the luck to have great people at our spaghetti dinner. A big thanks to all of you.
faq_description:
Got a question? We got an answer.
If your question isn't listed below, feel free to
faq_goal: What is the goal of ClouDIA?
faq_goal_text: The project's main objective is to gather data from projects all around the world in a veriety of scientific fields in order to someday maybe establish relations and improve our world !
faq_donate_text: We really appreciate that you want to contribute to ClouDIA, but unfortunatly, at the moment, we aren't ready to accept donations.
faq_create: How do I create an account?
faq_create_text: Simply click here and fill out the form to get started on the ClouDIA platform.
faq_log_in_text:
You need an account to log in to the ClouDIA platform. Click here to create it now!
If you do have an account simply log in here to access the platform.
faq_data: Can I add my own data?
faq_data_text:
Datas are automatically added to the ClouDIA system trough automated stations around the world.
If you are interrested in involving yourself in the ClouDIA project and working with us on your very own custom station, contact us.
sponsor_thanks: A special thanks to our sponsors
error_no_data_h2: There's no data for this sensor
error_no_select_h2: You must select a sensor first
error_no_logged_h2: Please log in before attempting to consult sensor's data.
error_account_created2: You can now log into system ClouDIA
